name: Crystal Dash (SP4R0W)
description:
by SP4R0W

Featuring art from Kenney & music by Benjamin Burnes

Description:

Relax and enjoy yourself with Crystal Dash - a simple clone of a cult classic Bejeweled! Get the highest score possible, but watch out for the ticking down timer - if it reaches 0 it's game over!

Features:

- Classic Bejeweled gameplay

- Relaxing atmosphere

- Different tracks you can switch in-game or even loop current ones playing

- Highscores list for the best players

If you find any bugs please report in comments! Thanks!
